p: The whole plant material was collected from Cholistan Desert near Baghdad Campus of the Islamia University of Bahawalpur, Pakistan. The material was identified by plant taxonomist Dr. Muhammad Serwar, Department of Life Sciences, the Islamia University of Bahawalpur, where a voucher specimen-2469 was deposited in the herbarium. The 15-day shade-dried whole plant material was ground into 10.0 g of powder, which was then extracted with 100.0 mL methanol in an ultrasonic ice-water bath for 1 h and was filtered. The filtrate was concentrated under vacuum and was transferred to an autosampler vial for UHPLC-MS analysis.
